original_text: And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
korean_text: 사람들이 솔로몬의 지혜를 들으러 왔으니 이는 그의 지혜의 소문을 들은 천하 모든 왕들이 보낸 자들이더라

sentences.original_text: And there came of all people
to hear the wisdom of Solomon
from all kings of the earth
which had heard of his wisdom
